title: Cyberpunk LED Jacket
description: Ultra-modern LED-embedded jacket with customizable light patterns. Perfect for nightlife and futuristic fashion enthusiasts. Features wireless control via smartphone app.

title: Holographic Visor Sunglasses
description: Cutting-edge sunglasses with holographic display capabilities. Projects augmented reality interface while maintaining sleek style.

title: Quantum Weave Backpack
description: Smart backpack with quantum-inspired design. Features built-in power bank, RFID protection, and expandable compartments.

title: Neural Link Bracelet
description: Elegant bracelet with embedded bio-sensors. Monitors vital signs and syncs with your digital devices.

title: Aura Pulse Sneakers
description: Dynamic sneakers with reactive lighting that responds to your movements. Perfect for both athletic performance and street style.
